about_the_game:
Froggy Destroyer is a game about a green ninja froggy and her teammates who fight against a variety of enemies that prevent them from taking fruit with themselves and reaching the finish line. But they are very loves the fruits and cups...
Each enemy behaves differently and will try to eliminate the main characters in various ways, it's can be a simple patrolling or poisoning with poisonous thorns.
In addition to enemies, the main character will have to avoid various traps, overcome obstacles and deftly use improvements than will help him pass the levels faster.

Just look at this frog in a red ninja headband, how cleverly it copes with enemies! And what else lies ahead...




  • 8 types of fruits
  • More than 20 types of dangerous enemies
  • More than 10 difficult traps and useful improvements
  • Various types of fruit boxes
  • Several main characters
  • Nice graphics
  • Funny music
  • Responsive controls

name: Froggy Destroyer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as a green froggy that destroys all enemies in its path. Avoid dangerous traps, use useful upgrades, collect all the fruits on your way and reach the finish line!
